body_html:
@soumith yup, in some settings NNPACK is slower than im2col + gemm i.e. a conv with input [1,3, 64, 64] through a conv inChannels=3, outChannels=64, kernelSize=3 I get the following times (averaged over 100 runs):

[DEFAULT]Avg iteration speed=0.3841ms
[NNPACK] Avg iteration speed=2.1265ms 	 speedup factor=0.180653
[MKLDNN] Avg iteration speed=0.3719ms 	 speedup factor=1.032965

where DEFAULT is caffe2's im2col + gemm. As you can see NNPack is much slower in this case

body:
@soumith yup, in some settings NNPACK is slower than im2col + gemm i.e. a conv with input `[1,3, 64, 64]` through a conv `inChannels=3, outChannels=64, kernelSize=3` I get the following times (averaged over 100 runs):

```
[DEFAULT]Avg iteration speed=0.3841ms
[NNPACK] Avg iteration speed=2.1265ms 	 speedup factor=0.180653
[MKLDNN] Avg iteration speed=0.3719ms 	 speedup factor=1.032965
```

where `DEFAULT` is caffe2's im2col + gemm. As you can see NNPack is much slower in this case
